name: v1.7
body:
- Dropped support for PrimaryPad:
- Removed old workarounds and hacks to correctly display Etherpad-based documents.

name: v1.6
body:
Dropped support for the following server (you can add them manually):
- Etherpad.net
- Titanpad.com
- Meetingwords.com
- Piratenpad.de

name: v1.5
body:
- More SQL injection fixes.
- Added pad URL copy function
- Dropped support for piratepad.net

name: Fixed SQL injection
body: As promised, this release fixes the issue that was detected by a Google bot.

name: v1.4
body:
New features:
- Fixes #52
- Includes this same list of features: https://github.com/mikifus/padland/releases/tag/v1.4-beta

Reasons for release:
- Months without any bug report.
- Transition to the new database structure looks solid.

Side note:
There's a warning in the logs about SQLite leaks and Google informed about a possible SQL injection issue. It is not a big deal as the app doesn't manage any sensitive data. This ought to be fixed in the next release.

name: New features
body:
- Fixed a bug for API < 23
- Full url can be now pasted for pad name and gets automatically parsed
- Added option to edit pads
- Allows to assign a local name for pads
- Allows better NodeJS interaction for compatibility with MyPads

**WARNING**: This version of the App makes deep changes to the database to correct an old issue. So **backup your list of pads before installing this version** just in case it breaks for you.

name: Major issue fix
body: Sorry for those affected by the bug. Here's a new release.

name: Hidden bugs fixed
body: The app needed a bit more of trial to find hidden bugs. Once solved, there is a new release.

name: Trailing slash bug fix
body: This version removes a bug when adding custom servers if a trailing slash is set by the user. No other known bugs for now.

name: Padland v1.3.4
body: Small improvements. No known bugs.

name: Update 1.3
body:
Small improvements:
- Screen rotation bug fixed
- External links are now opened in default browser
- Added SSL error management
- Minor bug fixes

name: Padland 1.3
body:
After some time the 1.3.1 candidate release version didn't receive any new bug report. This final release solves most issues and includes the most relevant features requested by the users. It includes a message when accessing titanpad.com's documents as the services is shutting down next year.

New features still require translation.

name: Release Candidate
body: This new version has no known bugs. If after some time it works will be the next release.

name: Introduction
body: In this version an introduction activity has been added to explain the users the basic usage of Padland. While it is far from perfect, it provides the basis for a small tutorial and makes the user feel more confortable.

name: HTTP Auth and regular intent-fitlers
body: Added HTTP Auth dialog that pops up when needed and asks for username and password. Also, back to regular intent-filters, previous version was catching all urls.

name: More complex urls in custom servers
body: This update adds the possibility to use any valid URL. Before it was limited just to the protocol and the host.

name: Alpha release
body: This release includes the custom servers feature for those who requested it to test it.

name: One more server. New Translation.
body: Added Malayalam translation and piratenpad.de server

name: French translation
body: Adds French translation and fixes a bug.

name: Less permissions
body: This version doesn't require as many permissions as the previous ones. I ought you to update for security reasons.

name: New translations
body: German and Japanese
